My main homepage is found [here](https://www.oyvindsolheim.com). This page is only used for my library of [LLM-written descriptions of my own code](Library). I used to include it on my main site but Google found it and demoted the whole web-page. Accordingly, I moved it to this separate domain. 

I am a Senior Research Fellow at [The Institute for Social Research (ISF)](https://samfunnsforskning.no) and the [Centre for Research on Civil Society and Voluntary Sector](https://www.samfunnsforskning.no/sivilsamfunn/english/). My research interests concern the the far right, social media, terrorism, but also the Norwegian civil society. I study Scandinavian right-wing extremism on social media as part of the [FREXO-project](https://www.oyvindsolheim.com/projects/FREXO). In addition, I was part of the research group at the Norwegian Holocaust Center studying [antisemitism and islamophobia in Norway](https://www.hlsenteret.no/forskning/jodisk-historie-og-antisemittisme/holdningsundersokelsene/holdningsundersokelse%202022-om-etniske-og-religiose-mino/). In my [PhD](https://www.oyvindsolheim.com/publications/PhD) I studied how terrorist attacks affect attitudes towards immigration and immigrants. I have also worked for the secretary to [valglovutvalget](https://valglovutvalget.no), the Norwegian Election Act Commission, which presented its report ([NOU:2020: 6 Frie og hemmelige valg --- Ny valglov](https://www.regjeringen.no/no/dokumenter/nou-2020-6/id2703131/)) on May 27, 2020.
